descriptionHtml:
I was browsing the other Main Menu Background Replacers on the Nexus when i saw a comment in the posts about how someone liked a personal background someone had made. the person with the background didnt want to share theirs, and i respect that.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />BUT, what i can do is take a person's preference and make them a background, custom tailored.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />I am new to Nexus modding, and saw this as a pre-learners intro into it. They aren't perfect, but they DO work, and aren't bad.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />In the Files Section you will find 2 versions of each background.
<br /><br />1.) With Bethesda Logo and
<br /><br />2.) Without Bethesda Logo
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Installation Instructions:
<br /><br />The install directions are the same for both versions
<br /><br />
<br /><br />1.) Unpack the file you downloaded to a location of your choice. Though dragging the files directly from the .rar file to the destination location is possible, this can result in less than necessary file integrity.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />2.) For safety reasons, i recommend you make a back up at this point of: Skyrim/Data/Meshes/Interface
<br /><br />Skyrim/Data/Textures/Interface
<br /><br />folders if they are present in your installation directory.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />3.) With the above backed up, Copy/Move the downloaded and extracted Data folder of this mod to your Skyrim Installation directory, NOT into the Data Folder. Overwrite when prompted.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />4.) Close all open windows and launch Skyrim via your favorite/current launcher. If you followed the above instructions, then your background should have been changed from the default Dragon and solid black to the background you downloaded.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Un-Installation:
<br /><br />
<br /><br />-Logo Version-
<br /><br />Delete the following files:
<br /><br />Data/Meshes/Interface/logo/logo.nif
<br /><br />Data/Textures/Interface/Objects/MAINMENUWALLPAPER.dds
<br /><br />
<br /><br />-No Logo Version-
<br /><br />Delete the following:
<br /><br />Data/Interface/startmenu.swf
<br /><br />Data/Meshes/Interface/logo/logo.nif
<br /><br />Data/Textures/Interface/Objects/MAINMENUWALLPAPER.dds
<br /><br />
<br /><br />No matter which options instructions you follow, to be safe re-merge your back up files with those in your data directory to insure any files you had before are restored.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />
author: Berenost
